metadata.title: CVE-2023-0416 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GNW dissector crash in Wireshark 4.0.0 to 4.0.2 and 3.6.0 to 3.6.10 andallows denial of service via packet injection or crafted capture file

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
